snippet: Tommy G. Thompson, a former governor, defeated three fellow conservatives in a statewide primary that splintered the Tea Party vote.
abstract: Former Wisconsin governor Tommy G Thompson defeats three fellow conservatives in a statewide Republican Senate primary that splintered the Tea Party vote; he will face Democratic Rep Tammy Baldwin in the general election, which many in the GOP consider critical to their efforts to take control of the Senate.

byline.contributor: Robbie Brown contributed reporting from Atlanta.

lead_paragraph: Tommy G. Thompson, a former governor, defeated three fellow conservatives in a statewide primary that splintered the Tea Party vote.

headline.seo: Tommy Thompson Wins G.O.P. Senate Primary in Wisconsin
headline.main: Thompson Wins G.O.P. Senate Race in Wisconsin
headline.print_headline: Thompson Wins G.O.P. Senate Race In Wisconsin
